overview: Julian is a founder, Director and Vice Chairman of Comcast Corporation and was Chief Executive Officer of Comcast Interactive Capital. Prior to his election as Vice Chairman, Julian served as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Comcast. As the Founding Partner, Julian was responsible for the overall management of the fund. He also acted as the official liaison for the fund to Comcast Corporation. Julian serves as a Director or Board Observer on the Boards of Comcast Corporation, RBB Fund, the National Cable Television Center, Amdocs, Ltd., and the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Julian was graduated from The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.
